title: 8-Bit Retro Game Sound Effects
description: 8-Bit Retro Game sound effects including retro loops, jingles, chirpy interface beeps, bleeps, and more!
longDescription:
Youtube Demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hPck3-s2Gqg


8-Bit Retro is a professionally designed sound library with retro-sounding beeps, bleeps, loops and jingles, that all sound like they came straight out of those legendary arcade video games and the time when Nintendo, C64, and Atari ruled The Earth!


Perfect for games, cartoons, and other projects involving retro game themes, these 8 bit sounds can be used in various ways for your production either as they are, or you can unlock countless new sound possibilities by playing with them, combining, looping, and layering them.


This fresh and original collection of 8-bit sound effects contains everything from retro-sounding loops and jingles, to the various chirpy computer blips, bleeps, jumps, coins, lasers and explosion sound effects, and it will instantly throw your audience back to the 80â€™s era and the time of classic arcade games, consoles and chiptune sounds!


8-Bit Retro Sound Effects List: https://www.soundresponse.net/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/8-Bit-Retro-Sound-Effects-List.pdf
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 672

Number of Audio Cues: 672

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Minutes of audio provided: 05.20 min
